mainEntity.name: How is the payoff timeline calculated?

acceptedAnswer.text: The estimate adds monthly interest to the current balance and subtracts your fixed payment until the balance reaches zero.

mainEntity.name: What happens if my payment is too low?

acceptedAnswer.text: If the payment does not cover monthly interest, the calculator warns you because the balance would never decrease.
